item.title: By: Jack Bobeck

item.description: Yannick, Great plugin, I am using it in 2 sites and will be recommending it to others! Outstanding solution! jack

Yannick,
Great plugin, I am using it in 2 sites and will be recommending it to others! Outstanding solution!

item.title: By: JohnD

item.description:
Hey Yannick,
Just want to say that you have a great plug in! I am also using your plugin in my site. More power!
